4311590.name: Hellgame: Prologue
4311590.description:
GAME OF DEATH MOVIEVERSE presents

HELLGAME: PROLOGUE

A GAME OF DEATH MOVIEVERSE experience

Step into the nightmare.

HELLGAME: PROLOGUE is the brutal opening chapter of the upcoming HELLGAME: ORIGINS trilogy — a fast, atmospheric blend of jump’n’run action, stealth survival horror, and cinematic storytelling.

You play as Timara, a fearless fighter caught between two unstoppable forces: the hordes of Hell… and the merciless soldiers of an evil Regime. Your mission is simple to understand—but almost impossible to survive:

Protect the Map of Death Souls. No matter the cost.

From a cursed cathedral, through shadowed forests, and deeper into the six realms of Hell, every step is a fight against the rules of reality. Because in Hell, the world itself is your enemy. Traps, ambushes, demonic hunters, and sudden deadly surprises will test your reflexes, your timing, and your nerves.

This is not a game where you can win every battle head-on.

Sometimes, the smartest move is not to attack… but to run.

Jump. Run. Hide. Slide. Survive.

And just when you think you know what kind of horror game this is… it changes the rules.

⸻

TIMERUN MODE — A WHOLE NEW WAY TO PLAY

Want a completely different experience?

Activate Timerun Mode and step into the shoes of Brian J. Williams, one of the heroes from DARK SECRETS: GAME OF DEATH – CHAPTER 2. This time, the hunted becomes the hunter.

In this mode, speed is everything.

Aggression is rewarded.

Shoot to kill. Aim for your life.

Fight back with precision, power, and pure adrenaline — and show Hell what happens when it meets someone who refuses to break.

⸻

CINEMATIC HORROR WITH A MOVIEVERSE DNA

HELLGAME: PROLOGUE is directly based on DARK SECRETS: GAME OF DEATH – CHAPTER 2, the second installment of the GAME OF DEATH movie franchise. The game was created in close collaboration with visionary cult director Timo Rose and producer Nando Rohner delivering the raw intensity, darkness, and violence fans expect.

Featuring a special voice appearance by rising horror star Lewis Santer

(Winnie-the-Pooh: Blood and Honey 2, Dark Secrets: Game of Death – Chapter 2).

With stunning visuals, 15 minutes of cutscenes, and a catchy dramatic neon-classic soundtrack, the prologue is built like a playable horror film — tight, intense, and unforgettable.

⸻

FEATURES

• Survival horror jump’n’run gameplay with brutal pacing

• Stealth-focused action: direct attacks are rarely the best option

• Two playable characters, two distinct gameplay styles

• a dramatic storyline with some twist and surprises

• Timerun Mode for speed, pressure, and adrenaline combat

• 15 minutes of cinematic cutscenes

• Neon-classic horror soundtrack with dramatic energy

• Blood, gore, and cult-horror atmosphere in collaboration with cult movie director Timo Rose and producer Nando Rohner

• A dark entry into the official HELLGAME: ORIGINS trilogy

⸻

HELL AWAITS.

This is only the beginning.

Will you enter?
